item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Looking for Bia Season 2 English Subtitles SRT
item.description:
Hi. I'm a new member so I apologize in advance for any mistakes I'll make.

I've been looking for Bia (2019) Season 2 subtitles in the Internet for quite a while and they don't seem to be available to download at the moment. There seem to be English subtitles on Disney Plus in select countries, but unfortunately, my country does not have Bia in its Disney Plus catalogue. Otherwise I'd just be watching it there. I'd be very grateful if someone posted the subtitles (preferably srt format) here or linked me somewhere I could find them. Thank you!
item.author: reyesiana
